biotools.summary: FPfilter is a false-positive specific filter for vcf files from whole genome sequencing. It is proved to be more false-positive specific than GATK hard filter.

bioschemas.name: FPfilter
bioschemas.summary: FPfilter is a false-positive specific filter for vcf files from whole genome sequencing. It is proved to be more false-positive specific than GATK hard filter.
